item.description:
Most know the history of Peter Parker getting bitten by

a radioactive Spider and becoming Spiderman.

I will be interested to see what this movie has to show?

What Spiderman villains will he have to go against?

 

A.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0948470/

www.imdb.com/title/tt0948470/

B.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spider-Man_in_film

 

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spider-Man_in_film

 

Those of you who live North and West of New Haven do not

Have to RSVP No and say that it is too far for you to travel.

I will delete that post if I read it.

I will be at the McDonald's at the end of the Stratford

Shopping Center around 6:30 p.m. before the

Movie starts if you want to meet me there.

The movie - Friend at the End of the World is no where local

so I am replacing it with Spiderman.
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone@ Spiderman at Stratford Theater
